page.title: 10Church.
page.content: Our church is a Church of England church.It is called Christ Church Glasson Dock. The vicar is called Mr.A. Rimmer. The church has a big organ.It has one bell in the tower.It has just one tower with about ten windows in it. Mr.Rimmer is not a full-time clergyman. Part of his work is acting chaplain at the Royal Lancaster Infirmary. Surrounding the church is the graveyard. The grave-digger is called Mr.Wood. Some of the gravestones are over 130 years old. The church is only tiny but people who visit Glasson Dock say it is very pretty.
